name: Edith CHASE, Next Best Friend of Randy Barbrie v. CUMBERLAND SCHOOL DEPT. et al.
name_abbreviation: Chase ex rel. Barbrie v. Cumberland School Dept.

parties: Edith CHASE, Next Best Friend of Randy Barbrie v. CUMBERLAND SCHOOL DEPT. et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petitioner’s motion to proceed herein in forma pauperis is granted. The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: S. Arlene Violet, Providence, for petitioner.
V. James Santaniello, Providence, Howard R. Haronian, Warwick, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
Edith CHASE, Next Best Friend of Randy Barbrie v. CUMBERLAND SCHOOL DEPT. et al.
No. 82-109-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 21, 1982.
S. Arlene Violet, Providence, for petitioner.
V. James Santaniello, Providence, Howard R. Haronian, Warwick, for respondents.
